conditionDTO Data Type

Namespace
(Default)
Properties
name data type type namespace min/max occurs description
evaluation_id int element 0/1 The identifier to be used for advanced conditions on actions. If you set logic_type = advanced on the action this condition is part of, you must give each condition a unique evaluation_id from the set (1,2,3,...,n), where n is the number of conditions.
Ex: If you have three conditions, each condition have a unique evaluation_id of 1, 2, or 3.
Any other use of this field will either be ignored or throw an error.
field_name string element 0/1 The field to which this condition applies (if any).
method string element 0/1 The name of the method (operation) for the condition. You can figure out what "method" values are supported for a field by consulting the fieldDefDTO (operations property).
type string element 0/1 The type for the condition. This property is for UI side use only, useful for storing unit of time in date time filters like (minutes, hours, days)
value anyType element 0/1 The value for the condition.

Example

<conditionDTO>
  <method>...</method>
  <field_name>...</field_name>
  <value>...</value>
  <type>...</type>
  <evaluation_id>...</evaluation_id>
</conditionDTO>
